actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a State to modify its coverage agreement so as to exclude services performed in any year by an election official or election worker if the remuneration paid for such services is less than $300 (instead of only if such remuneration is less than $100 as at present).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) to permit a State to modify its coverage agreement to exclude election officials and workers whose remuneration is less than $300. Authorizes a State to make such exclusion effective in the calendar year preceding the delivery of its modification to the Secretary of Health and Human Services (formerly, the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a State to modify its coverage agreement so as to exclude services performed in any year by an election official or election worker if the remuneration paid for such services is less than $300 (instead of only if such remuneration is less than $100 as at present).
